text: I nama ɲinan Simeyi xɔn naxan i fɛma, Geraa dii xɛmɛna, Bunyamin kaan naxan kelixi Baxurin taani. N to n gi lɔxɔn naxan yi Maxanayin taani, a danga ɲaxine ti nɛn n xili ma. Koni n xɛtɛmatɔna, a godo nɛn n nalandeni Yurudɛn baan dɛ, n nan n kɔlɔ a xa Alatala yi, n naxa, ‘N mi fa i faxama silanfanna ra.’
